categories: Category:Star Wars: War of the Bounty Hunters

nodes.text: Doctor Aphra 12 is the twelfth issue of the canon comic series Star Wars: Doctor Aphra. The issue was written by Alyssa Wong, illustrated by Minkyu Jung, and published by Marvel Comics on July 14, 2021.

"PARTY TRICKS" A MYSTERIOUS INVITATION leads DOCTOR
APHRA and SANA STARROS to an exclusive party—teeming
with scum and villainy! Will Aphra and Sana be able to survive
the underworld social event of the century? Or will their cover be
blown by A FAMILIAR FACE with an agenda of their own?
